summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 57th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12918 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
